moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon. It can also warp to the last Pokémon Center visited.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

moves.name: Wish
moves.description: One turn after this move is used, the target's HP is restored by half the user's maximum HP.

moves.name: Psycho Shift
moves.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Ominous Wind
moves.description: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Power Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.
